channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jury to begin deliberations in Trump hush money trial
item.description: The 12-person jury in Donald Trump's historic criminal hush money trial is set to begin deliberations today in the New York courthouse. Follow here for the latest live news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: An Iceland volcano starts erupting again, spewing lava into the sky
item.description: A volcano in southwestern Iceland is erupting, spewing red streams of lava in its latest display of nature’s power

item.title: An end run around democracy: Red state Republicans hack the system
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Saving for college: What to know about 529 plans
item.description: Wednesday is May 29, which is also known as "529 Day," aimed at raising awareness about 529 college savings plans. CBS News business analyst Jill Schlesinger explains how you can take advantage of government programs for education.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: US President Joe Biden is not altering his policy toward Israel following an Israeli strike that killed more than 45 people in Rafah. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Trump trial live updates: Jury deliberations to get underway
item.description: Follow the latest developments in former President Donald Trump's criminal hush money trial in New York.

item.title: US consumers show the Fed its backward problem with high rates: Morning Brief
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Patrol car hits women on Florida beach; sergeant cited for careless driving
item.description: A sergeant patrolling Daytona Beach in a public safety cruiser struck and injured two 18-year-old women as they sunbathed on Memorial Day.

item.title: May 28, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Global condemnation is mounting over Israel's airstrike on a camp for displaced people in Rafah that killed at least 45 people, many of whom were women and children.

item.title: Nissan warns owners of older vehicles not to drive them due to risk of exploding air bag inflators
item.description: Nissan is urging the owners of about 84,000 older vehicles to stop driving them because their Takata air bag inflators are at high risk of exploding in a crash and hurling metal fragments

item.title: Gen X is the 401(k) 'experiment generation.' Here's how that's playing out.
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Lawsuit alleges American Airlines removed Black men from flight over odor complaint
item.description: First on "CBS Mornings," three passengers are suing American Airlines, alleging that employees removed all Black men from a flight over a body odor complaint. The incident is detailed in a newly-filed lawsuit. The men shared their story first with CBS News senior transportation correspondent Kris Van Cleave.

item.title: Closing arguments wrap in Trump hush money trial
item.description: Attorneys for the prosecution and defense delivered closing arguments Tuesday in Donald Trump's historic criminal hush money trial in New York.

item.title: Nearly 3 out of 10 children in Afghanistan face crisis or emergency level of hunger
item.description: About 6.5 million children in Afghanistan are forecast to experience crisis levels of hunger in 2024

item.title: Donald Trump's Ranting Sticky Note Is Caught On Camera By Photographer
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Trump trial judge delivers jury instructions ahead of deliberations
item.description: The jury in Donald Trump's criminal trial in New York is set to begin deliberations Wednesday, marking the beginning of the end of the criminal trial.

item.title: How to cool down without AC
item.description: No air conditioning? Here are 14 methods for cooling your body and buffering your house from the outside heat.

item.title: WATCH: ‘Crazy’ lightning pattern found on Ohio golf course after thunderstorm
item.description: After thunderstorms moved through the Cincinnati area last week, one man decided to inspect the damage at a local golf course. He was surprised by what he found on one of the greens.

item.title: Historic CT mill property up for sale with approved plans for dozens of apartments
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: 2 new giant pandas are returning to D.C. zoo from China
item.description: One of the pandas being brought to the Smithsonian's National Zoo is the grandson of the pair that left the zoo in 2023.
